import React from "react"; export default function BlogCard(props) { const ImgLink = `http://localhost:8000${props.data.image}`; const tags = props.data.sub_category.split(",") return (
Pro Essential

{props.data.title}

{props.data.description}

{ tags.map((tag)=>{ {tag} }) }
25 Feburary 2023
); }
